summary: A jealous concert pianist murders his wife's lover, then frames an innocent taxi driver for the crime.
cast: Donald Buka|Joan Camden|Francis Lederer|Adrienne Gessner|Inge Konradi|Gisela Wilke|Hermann Erhardt|Egon von Jordan|Manfred Inger|Karl Farkas|Louis Ousted
director: Director: Gunther von Fritsch (as Gunther Fritsch)
title: Stolen Identity
